The life of John Donne, Dr. in divinity, and late dean of Saint Pauls Church London Walton, Izaak, 1593-1683.
The second impression corrected and enlarged.
[17], 148 p.
Printed by J.G. for R. Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1658.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Dedicatory epistle signed Issac Walton.
=======
